longBio:
I'm a final year Computer Engineering student at the University of the Balearic Islands. My job experience includes doing a Software Development Engineer internship at Amazon and working as a collaborating student developing the website of my university's economics faculty.

My topics of interest include backend development, cloud computing, databases, compilers, and machine learning, although I'm always looking to expand my knowledge in new fields. Some of the programming languages that I have more experience with are Java, TypeScript, Python and Go.
